name: ILP2-Yorick-Zorn-Fawictt
description:
Gameplay Instructions

all art is not mine. I simply used them for this programming assignment.

All controls:

This game uses WASD for movement. I was not able to reach the requirement of using mouse input instead.

All objectives:

Objective of the game is to walk around map and collect coins that will be added to a GUI coin counter. 

Any other important/useful information for the game:

Includes two scenes (main menu and game scene) also includes Lerp object when the game scene starts

Noticed that my scale is not constrained in full screen mode
